comment.author: 63974632@N07
comment._content: Orihuela belongs to Alicante (Valencia), not to Murcia.

comment.author: 68447611@N02
comment._content: En esa época pertenecía a Murcia

comment.author: 61498590@N03
comment._content: Thanks very much for the comments. As I understand it, the city of Orihuela has alternately belonged at various time in its history to either the province of Murcia and the province of Alicante. I believe the title above is based on an original inscribed or printed description found on the photograph. In any event, I think it is a terrific photograph, and one of my favorite by this artist. Thanks again.

comment.author: 32218916@N08
